# Detect Law (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** Adept 1, [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Component:** V, S, DF

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped emanation

**Duration:** Concentration, up to 10 minutes/ level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 267

This spell functions like *[[Detect Evil (Spell)|detect evil]]*, except that it detects the auras of lawful creatures, clerics of lawful deities, lawful spells, and lawful magic items, and you are vulnerable to an overwhelming lawful aura if you are chaotic.
